summary: Teaches the move Focus Blast, a high-risk, high-reward Fighting-type special attack with 120 power, 70% accuracy, and a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense.
typical_users: Special Attackers needing Fighting coverage (e.g., Alakazam, Gengar)
Pokémon with poor physical movepools (e.g., Porygon-Z)
Wallbreakers aiming to hit Steel, Rock, Dark, Normal, and Ice types super effectively
